features: [9 Inch Knives-4PCS]- 4 piece dinner Knives have an ergonomically designed rounded edge handle for a comfortable grip.The sturdy construction makes the knives less bendable, adding more elegance and class to your table and making your daily dining experience more satisfying.

[7.3 Inch Forks-4PCS]- 4 piece dinner forks are made of top food grade stainless steel. Mirror polish makes these modern silverware set always keep shining and smooth surface ensures non scratch your mouth. They are resistant to rust, corrosion and dishwasher safe.

[7.3 Inch Spoons-4PCS]- 4 piece soup spoons have an ergonomically designed rounded edge handle for a comfortable grip.The sturdy construction makes the spoon less bendable, adding more elegance and class to your table and making your daily dining experience more satisfying.
[Multi-purpose use]- This knives forks spoons silverware set is perfect for formal occasions, parties or festivals, such as parties, weddings, restaurants, celebrations, family dinners,camping etc.

[Dishwasher Safe]- The total quantity of dinner kinves and dinner forks and dinner spoons is 12. They are all designed ergonomically, which has mirror polished and smooth edges for a comfortable feel. Meanwhile, this kitchen utensil set has a sturdy structure, so it can be used for a long time. Most importantly, the silverware sets are dishwasher safe, so you can just put them in a dishwasher for saving time in hand washing.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Specification: Material:18/10 stainless steel Package includes: 9'' Dinner Knife x4 7.3" Dinner Fork x 4 7.3“ Dinner Spoon x 4 Support: If you have any questions about our silverware set, Please let us know and we will solve it for you within 24 hours. Note: Please wash the silverware set at first time.After each time's use, threw them in dishwasher or wash by hand，and they'll come out as new.Please be careful when using them. Pointed items included, please keep them away from kids.

HIGH QUALITY STAINLESS STEEL This silverware set is made of 18/10 stainless steel which is very durable, corrosion resistant, nickel free and will not produce residues or odors like other materials. Meanwhile, its sturdiness ensures that it will not bend easily providing you with long - term use. COMFORTABLE HANDLE Our cutlery is carefully weighted to the right thickness and features ergonomically designed handles for a comfortable grip. Mirror polished to ensure no rough spots hurt your mouth Never need to refinish and keep the shine. MULTI-PURPOSE USE： This cutlery set contains 4 forks 、 4 knives and 4 spoons, perfect for everyday home kitchen use, restaurants, hotels, or as a decent gift. Our silverware set is also suitable for parties, festivals and formal events such as weddings, celebrations, family dinners and more! EASY TO CLEAN Dishwasher safe to save you time For best results . For best results rinse before washing and within 2 hours of use,your proper care can make these tableware always looks as good as new, and enable it to last for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Heavy and sturdy. The spoons are large like a soup. Hoping to find smaller ones to match.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 7.3” Fork and Spoon Are Perfect Size
reviews.reviewText: I decided on the set with the 7.3” forks because of so many comments about how huge the other size was. Those are the perfect size. The 7.3” spoons are on the bigger size, but I like them!Dishwasher safe, (I’ve run them through a few times) and excellent quality.Love them!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These seem like good quality. We wanted an upgrade from walmart silverware because they hurt our hands so I got 2 sets of these. I don’t know what the deal is with the spoons. They are bigger than soup spoons. Almost as big as serving spoons. Definitely too big for my mouth. I ended up ordering 2 sets of their “teaspoons”. They are the right size. They definitely aren’t teaspoons. They did call them dessert spoons too. If that means anything to you. Anyway, I like this silverware a lot. It’s much heavier than what we had and it’s pretty. Comfortable to use. They stack well in the tray. Not flopping around every time you reach for one. I like them. The price was good in my opinion for what we got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality is impeccable
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was a little surprised of the great quality for this set, because of the box it came in! The set came in just a small little box, nothing fancy like you would see in a Macy’s or any other department store! I thought the set was going to be thin and cheap, and something that would bend up over the course of a week! But this flatware set lives up to its “High Quality” standard mentioned on the box and in the description, it’s sturdy, gives expensive look/feel and the set is heavy stainless steel! I’m in love with my flatware set and will be purchasing more as I toss out my old set! Happy customer!! 🩷☺️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks good. May not be the best stainless steel.
reviews.reviewText: These are a good size. The feel heavy but I compared them to my stainless steel Henkel knifes and the color of the steel is different.They are magnetic which doesn't rull out that they are stainless steel, but I definitely think it's a lower grade stainless.The spoons are large and fairly deep. Good for soups or ice-cream.The knives have some serrations that aren't ground very well. It will likely only work as a butter knife or on very soft easy to cut foods.The forks have sharp edges between the tines "pointy parts" that are rough and have unfinished cut or ground materials in them.Overall for the price I think these deserve 5 stars, but I might change that if they rust in the dishwasher.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, normal silverwaee
reviews.reviewText: Simple fork, spoon, and knife set of 6!! No fancy design, nicely weighted, knife could be used as a steak knife because it has an actual nice serrated edge. I like that the option to buy one each was available, instead of 2 spoons, 2 forks and knives. Very happy with the option and product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy and thick. Built for the long haul.
